Alright I beat all the levels, up to Ambulance - Brain Transplant.  But then for some reason in that particular level, my framerate PLUMMETS and the game becomes horribly choppy and stuttering and is completely unplayable.  Which is really weird, considering that I get 60fps in all the other levels.  Oh and lowering graphics settings does nothing.

A quick google search reveals that people have had this same problem on a variety of different levels, but there is no fix yet.
My body is ready.
